Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, both the interior and the exterior are covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip, the exterior bears faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394765) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394765)
